about_us.welcome_message: Welcome to E-golden – Your Trusted Partner for Relocation to Portugal.
about_us.who_we_are: At E-golden, we specialize in providing comprehensive relocation services tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. The idea of creating E-golden was due to the fact that we realized the difficulty that people who wanted to move to Portugal faced. Therefore, combining our experience in providing the necessary services, as well as having ourselves, founders of E-golden, gone through an equivalent process, we welcome helping as many people as possible to receive the best and most comfortable experience in during your relocation process.
about_us.our_mission: Our mission is to deliver top-tier relocation services that exceed client expectations. We aim to minimize downtime and disruptions, allowing a smoothly transition to their new locations and resume operations as quickly as possible.
about_us.our_vision: We envision being the leading provider of relocation services globally, recognized for our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. Our goal is to set new standards in the relocation industry, ensuring every move is a step forward for our clients.

our_values.integrity: We conduct our business with the highest ethical standards, ensuring transparency and honesty in all our dealings.
our_values.customer_focus: Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We strive to understand their unique needs and provide customized solutions.
our_values.excellence: We are committed to delivering exceptional service and continuously improving our processes to exceed client expectations.

relocation-residency.title: Relocation and Residency
description: Are you thinking about moving to a different country? Portugal will be the right place to fulfil your dreams and needs.
We can tailor a package of services perfectly suited to your exact needs, including residency permits, tax advice, home search, opening bank account, health insurance, driving license, and others.

relocation_to_portugal.description: When you think about embracing a new adventure as moving to a different country, the list of formalities that need to be dealt with can seem hard to fulfil at the first sight. This is one of the reasons it makes perfect sense to take advantage of E-golden specialised relocation services in Portugal. We will walk alongside you on this adventure. Our main goal is to provide a one stop shop service for you to enjoy the most of your new journey.

residency_permits.description: Residency permits in Portugal provide a pathway to a new life in one of Europe's most desirable destinations. Whether through investment, employment, or family ties, Portugal offers a range of options for individuals seeking to establish residency in this beautiful country. With its welcoming atmosphere, rich culture, and stunning landscapes, Portugal truly is a gateway to European living. Obtaining residency in Portugal comes with a host of benefits. Beyond the opportunity to live in a safe and welcoming country with a high standard of living, residents also have access to Portugal's excellent healthcare and education systems. Additionally, residency in Portugal grants access to the wider Schengen Area, allowing for visa-free travel throughout much of Europe.
options: Digital Nomad Visa – You get your Visa by Working remotely or running a business
D2 Visa – Freelancer/Independent services providers Visa
Startup Visa – Visa by developing an entrepreneurial/innovative business in Portugal
Student Visa – Residence permit for studying in Portugal
Family Reunion Visa – By being Portuguese or a Residency permit holder you can secure your family members a Visa

tax-planning-advice.title: Tax Planning and advice
description: Understanding your tax obligations and its impact on your personal life and business is essential when you decide to relocate or invest in a new country.

tax_planning_and_advice.description: Tax planning is essential for any Company or Entrepreneur whose objective is to prosper in the development of their business. The decision to invest in a business, particularly one with long-term prospects, requires careful consideration of tax obligations and their resulting impact on the development of our proposed enterprise. An individual's decision to invest or start a life in another country is ultimately based on knowledge of Double Taxation Treaties and the potential benefits they offer, as well as familiarity with the nation's tax laws at a national level. In order to effectively carry out any project, it is essential to consult with the most up-to-date tax information available. E-Golden can help you identify the best way to proceed based on your specific circumstances, by having specialized and personal service to reduce the risks with the tax burden and, thus, improve your results and income.

Business Solutions Services (BSS) are designed to address these challenges by providing a wide range of strategic, operational, and technological services that help organizations optimize their performance, achieve their goals, and drive sustainable growth.
